Name: Spinning Vortex
Intro: Palefire can move and ignore enemy collision when pinging Red Orbs.

Name: Data Backup
Intro: Palefire gains one 1 revival chance for every battle. 50% HP will be restored upon revival.

Name: Flame Modification
Intro: Yellow Orbs leave a bigger burning area that lasts longer.

Name: High Frequency Reaction
Intro: The Extra DMG increases when you reach 50 combos. The higher the combos (up to 150), the greater the Extra DMG. This effect is removed when combos fall below 50.

Name: Impact Ammo
Intro: Blue Orbs gain extra repelling distance and reduce target's movement speed for 5s.

Name: Signature Evolution
Intro: Signature Move deals Fire DMG instead and will leave a burning area upon finish.

Name: Super Blast
Intro: Gains an extra shield, Super Armor, and DMG Reduction for 5s when pinging Yellow Orbs.

Name: Energy Burst
Intro: The more enemies killed within a short time, the more powerful DMG Bonus will be granted.

Name: Traction Field
Intro: Blue Orbs have a bigger range and stronger pull. They will cause an additional explosion upon finish.

Name: Stablization Device
Intro: The more enemies are around, the higher your DEF will be.

Name: Scattering Projectiles Modification
Intro: Scattering Projectiles will be guaranteed to be critical at close range and grant 1 Signature Move Energy for each attack.

Name: Charged Impact
Intro: Gains DMG Bonus for 3s after dodging.

Name: Overload Cannonade
Intro: Fires 3 shots in a row instead in the Barrage Stance.

Name: Signature Evolution
Intro: Signature Move will rain down more concentrated explosions followed by a Karenina's special bomb.
